name: Verbatim Championship - My Media Monster
summary: Verbatim Championship is the promotional website to celebrate and advertise launching a Japanese branch of the American recording media company Verbatim. Players can create their own original Media Monsters, and let them fight with others.
info:
• 中文名: Verbatim机器人大战
  • 平台: flash
  • 平台: web

  • 发行日期: 2009年11月
  • 售价: 免费
